Rough translation of instructions...

1. Install the program, do not launch it.
2. Copy the contents of the folder "crack" and paste and replace files in "C:\Program Files\Driver-Soft\DriverGenius" [default install location; replace if yours is different].

READY!!!

NOTE. This crack is for the version downloaded from the DriverGenius web page. [I'm guessing this means don't update]

Greetings from your friend,
Gamolama

[A note from me: These steps allowed successful installation.  I also disconnected from my internet upon first launch.  Good luck and feel free to post notes on my translation if your Spanish is better.  Gracias gamolama!]

Second note.  It totally fixed every driver problem I had.  After I fixed everything, I decided to see if the update would work.  DO NOT UPDATE.  It will just force you to register (ie. pay).  Thanks, great torrent!
after update, re-apply the same patch over it again (making sure you've closed the program) and run it again. You'll then have fully working program with all updates included :-)
Did the same as James 1744 and it works ok.  Sometimes driver take a while to download.

yeah follow james. update drivers and then scan. dont register. just close software down. and paste crack again into driver genius folder. run driver genius again but dont update. then scan for drivers and it will do its job. ta james
